Title: MAS500 .Net Extensions
Description: Public repository for .Net/.Net 2.0 extensions and rewrites to Sage MAS 500. SOTA Control rewrites, Framework and Object manager hooks, SOTA Interfaces for .NET
HomeWiki:
MAS500.Net Extensions

The intent of this project is to give the MAS500 community a jumping off point to .Net 2.0. The SDK.Net from Sage has been slow to deliver and we need to push forward from VB6 at all costs. We are looking for MAS 500 .NET developers to share in the creation of the following:

Request Developer Enrollment Please include your CodePlex UserID and any additional information in the body of the email.

Components and Tasks
  • .Net replacement for common SOTA Controls
    • SOTA DropDown
    • SOTA MaskedEdit
    • SOTA Lookup
    • SOTA TextLookUp
    • SOTA GL Account Lookup
  • Tutorial and Samples of .Net SOTA Projects
  • Forum Specifically for MAS500 Corporate Developers to share work, experience and products
